If youâ€™re a noob or youâ€™re just not sure how to use the VLC Audio Synchronization here's a quick run through... Start the movie and then go to the tool bar and left click on "tools", go down to "Track Synchronizationâ€ and left click on that, the file page should show up as "synchronization", just go down to the "Audio/Video" section and adjust the "Advance of audio over video" by either clicking the arrow up (+0.100's) or down (-0.100's) until you have in-lined the audio with the video... Hope this helps...
